availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Benjamin F. Pratt (Greenup County, Kentucky, JP? )

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, merchant and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Hannah J. Pratt. Father of Edward D. Pratt. Student in Greenup County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Greenup County in 1860. Household owned one enslaved person in Greenup County in 1860. Commissioned as a justice of the peace in Greenup County on September 15, 1862. Merchant in Greenup County in 1863.

ab.bibl:

Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Greenup County, KY, September 1863.
